thread.title: U.S. probing reports CIA chief's personal email hacked: CNN - Reuters
thread.title_full: U.S. probing reports CIA chief's personal email hacked: CNN - Reuters - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Reuters
title: U.S. probing reports CIA chief's personal email hacked: CNN - Reuters
text:
The FBI and the Secret Service are investigating reports that CIA Director John Brennan's personal email had been hacked, although no classified information had been accessed, CNN said. The New York Post reported on Monday that a high school student claimed to have hacked into Brennan's private AOL account and the Comcast account of Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson.
 Reuters.
